thread.title: Juliet Szabo
thread.title_full: Thrift Books reviewed by Juliet Szabo

author: Juliet Szabo
title: Juliet Szabo
text:
I already recommended your site to many people before I even got this survey and am only too happy to fill it out. The (not at all common) book came in pristine condition, at an unbelievable price, including shipping. The book I ordered is the only book written about the Hungarian pianist Ervin Nyiregyhazi, a virtually unknown and unforgotten pianist even by classical music fans.
Your google guarantee is all the better.
Great company, which I never would have found had one of the major online companies (I won't include their name) not wanted far, far more for the book, particularly with the additional shipping charges.
Juliet Szabo
Boston, Massachusetts
